title: NIT Jalandhar Jobs 2026 - Apply Online for 101 Faculty Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Jalandhar (NIT Jalandhar) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 101 Assistant Professor, Associate Professor, and Professor Jobs. Interested anbd eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, Ph.D., can apply for the NIT Jalandhar Jobs 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have...
